body_html:
1. Installed from pip (ver. 9.0.1) with python 2.7
  2. No. Simply run "python foo.py" you mentioned above could produce the issue on my machine.
  3. The command you provided outputs:
ldd: /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/_C.so: No such file or directory

I run following instead:

ldd /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/_C.so

And here are the outputs:

	linux-vdso.so.1 =>  (0x00007fffdc5a0000)
	/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/4.8/libgomp.so (0x00007f2d7b78e000)
	libshm.so => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libshm.so (0x00007f2d7b4ae000)
	libcudart.so.8.0 => /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so.8.0 (0x00007f2d7b248000)
	libcudnn.so.6 => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libcudnn.so.6 (0x00007f2d71ce6000)
	libpython2.7.so.1.0 => /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpython2.7.so.1.0 (0x00007f2d71766000)
	libTH.so.1 => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libTH.so.1 (0x00007f2d711c2000)
	libTHS.so.1 => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libTHS.so.1 (0x00007f2d70f92000)
	libTHPP.so.1 => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libTHPP.so.1 (0x00007f2d70bff000)
	libTHNN.so.1 => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libTHNN.so.1 (0x00007f2d708fb000)
	libTHC.so.1 => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libTHC.so.1 (0x00007f2d61d1d000)
	libTHCS.so.1 => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libTHCS.so.1 (0x00007f2d619b2000)
	libTHCUNN.so.1 => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libTHCUNN.so.1 (0x00007f2d5ed9a000)
	libnccl.so.1 => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libnccl.so.1 (0x00007f2d5c0be000)
	libgcc_s.so.1 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgcc_s.so.1 (0x00007f2d5bea8000)
	libpthread.so.0 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0 (0x00007f2d5bc8a000)
	libc.so.6 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6 (0x00007f2d5b8c5000)
	/lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 (0x00007f2d7c86c000)
	librt.so.1 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so.1 (0x00007f2d5b6bd000)
	libm.so.6 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libm.so.6 (0x00007f2d5b3b7000)
	libdl.so.2 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libdl.so.2 (0x00007f2d5b1b3000)
	libstdc++.so.6 => /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6 (0x00007f2d5aeaf000)
	libz.so.1 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libz.so.1 (0x00007f2d5ac96000)
	libutil.so.1 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libutil.so.1 (0x00007f2d5aa93000)
	libmkl_intel_lp64.so => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libmkl_intel_lp64.so (0x00007f2d5a071000)
	libmkl_intel_thread.so => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libmkl_intel_thread.so (0x00007f2d5860c000)
	libmkl_core.so => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libmkl_core.so (0x00007f2d56b14000)
	libiomp5.so => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libiomp5.so (0x00007f2d5676a000)
	libcublas.so.8.0 => /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcublas.so.8.0 (0x00007f2d53dba000)
	libcurand.so.8.0 => /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcurand.so.8.0 (0x00007f2d4fe51000)
	libcusparse.so.8.0 => /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcusparse.so.8.0 (0x00007f2d4d343000)

I compared the list between two machines.
The machine with the issue has the line:

/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/4.8/libgomp.so (0x00007f2d7b78e000)

The machine "without" the issue use the one in torch:

libgomp.so.1 => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libgomp.so.1 (0x00007fa9f10eb000)

Could it cause the issue?

body:
1. Installed from pip (ver. 9.0.1) with python 2.7
2. No. Simply run "python foo.py" you mentioned above could produce the issue on my machine.
3. The command you provided outputs:
```
ldd: /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/_C.so: No such file or directory
```
I run following instead:
```
ldd /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/_C.so
``````
And here are the outputs:
```
	linux-vdso.so.1 =>  (0x00007fffdc5a0000)
	/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/4.8/libgomp.so (0x00007f2d7b78e000)
	libshm.so => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libshm.so (0x00007f2d7b4ae000)
	libcudart.so.8.0 => /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so.8.0 (0x00007f2d7b248000)
	libcudnn.so.6 => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libcudnn.so.6 (0x00007f2d71ce6000)
	libpython2.7.so.1.0 => /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpython2.7.so.1.0 (0x00007f2d71766000)
	libTH.so.1 => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libTH.so.1 (0x00007f2d711c2000)
	libTHS.so.1 => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libTHS.so.1 (0x00007f2d70f92000)
	libTHPP.so.1 => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libTHPP.so.1 (0x00007f2d70bff000)
	libTHNN.so.1 => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libTHNN.so.1 (0x00007f2d708fb000)
	libTHC.so.1 => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libTHC.so.1 (0x00007f2d61d1d000)
	libTHCS.so.1 => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libTHCS.so.1 (0x00007f2d619b2000)
	libTHCUNN.so.1 => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libTHCUNN.so.1 (0x00007f2d5ed9a000)
	libnccl.so.1 => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libnccl.so.1 (0x00007f2d5c0be000)
	libgcc_s.so.1 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgcc_s.so.1 (0x00007f2d5bea8000)
	libpthread.so.0 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0 (0x00007f2d5bc8a000)
	libc.so.6 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6 (0x00007f2d5b8c5000)
	/lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 (0x00007f2d7c86c000)
	librt.so.1 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so.1 (0x00007f2d5b6bd000)
	libm.so.6 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libm.so.6 (0x00007f2d5b3b7000)
	libdl.so.2 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libdl.so.2 (0x00007f2d5b1b3000)
	libstdc++.so.6 => /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6 (0x00007f2d5aeaf000)
	libz.so.1 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libz.so.1 (0x00007f2d5ac96000)
	libutil.so.1 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libutil.so.1 (0x00007f2d5aa93000)
	libmkl_intel_lp64.so => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libmkl_intel_lp64.so (0x00007f2d5a071000)
	libmkl_intel_thread.so => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libmkl_intel_thread.so (0x00007f2d5860c000)
	libmkl_core.so => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libmkl_core.so (0x00007f2d56b14000)
	libiomp5.so => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libiomp5.so (0x00007f2d5676a000)
	libcublas.so.8.0 => /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcublas.so.8.0 (0x00007f2d53dba000)
	libcurand.so.8.0 => /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcurand.so.8.0 (0x00007f2d4fe51000)
	libcusparse.so.8.0 => /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcusparse.so.8.0 (0x00007f2d4d343000)
```
I compared the list between two machines.
The machine with the issue has the line:
```
/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/4.8/libgomp.so (0x00007f2d7b78e000)
```
The machine "without" the issue use the one in torch:
```
libgomp.so.1 => /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/lib/libgomp.so.1 (0x00007fa9f10eb000)
```
Could it cause the issue?
